creator: fern@interdimensions.com
text:
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.ejb.EjbJar

The generic ejbjar task creates jar files that do not contain a MANIFEST.MF.
Thus when readers from j2ee try to open is ( deployTool, verifier, etc ), they
crash.

creator: conor@apache.org
text: I have fixed this in CVS and will be generating a new beta in a few days
